sys_script_include.name: ReservationUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_9018442997360110002ffef3a253af11
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_616811_car_renta.ReservationUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ReservationUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ReservationUtils = Class.create();
ReservationUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{

	checkExistingReservation: function() {
		var carId = this.getParameter('sysparm_car_id');
		var startDateTime = this.getParameter('sysparm_start_dt');
		var endDateTime = this.getParameter('sysparm_end_dt');

		var startParsed = Date.parse(startDateTime);
		var endParsed = Date.parse(endDateTime);

		var startGDateTime = new GlideDateTime();
		var endGDateTime = new GlideDateTime();

		startGDateTime.setValue(parseInt(startParsed));
		endGDateTime.setValue(parseInt(endParsed));
		
		var startTime = startGDateTime.getTime().toString().split(" ")[1];
		var endTime = endGDateTime.getTime().toString().split(" ")[1];
		
		
		
		var RESERVATION_UNIQUE = "datetime<=javascript:gs.dateGenerate('"+startGDateTime.getDate()+"','"+startTime+"')^end_datetime>=javascript:gs.dateGenerate('"+startGDateTime.getDate()+"','"+startTime+"')^car="+carId+"^NQcar="+carId+"^datetime<=javascript:gs.dateGenerate('"+endGDateTime.getDate()+"','"+endTime+"')^end_datetime>=javascript:gs.dateGenerate('"+endGDateTime.getDate()+"','"+endTime+"')^NQcar="+carId+"^datetime>=javascript:gs.dateGenerate('"+startGDateTime.getDate()+"','"+startTime+"')^datetime<=javascript:gs.dateGenerate('"+endGDateTime.getDate()+"','"+endTime+"')^end_datetime>=javascript:gs.dateGenerate('"+startGDateTime.getDate()+"','"+startTime+"')^end_datetime<=javascript:gs.dateGenerate('"+endGDateTime.getDate()+"','"+endTime+"')";

		
		
		
		gs.info("query string: " + RESERVATION_UNIQUE);
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord('x_616811_car_renta_scheduled_reservations');
		gr.addEncodedQuery(RESERVATION_UNIQUE);
		
		gr.query();

		if (gr.next()) {
			gs.info("gr:" + gr.toString);
			return true;
		}

		return false;
	},
    type: 'ReservationUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>maryanne.labasan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 05:09:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>9018442997360110002ffef3a253af11</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReservationUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Car Rental Reservation" source="x_616811_car_renta">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Car Rental Reservation">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9018442997360110002ffef3a253af11</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>maryanne.labasan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 01:42:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
